description: This file defines several React components for rendering various types of charts (Line, Bar, Pie) using the Recharts library. The components are designed for a minimalist theme and include features like gradients, stacking, and customizable colors, intended for use in a UI dashboard related to cloud resource management.
external_methods: LineChart, Line, XAxis, YAxis, Tooltip, ResponsiveContainer, CartesianGrid, Legend, AreaChart, Area, BarChart, Bar, PieChart, Pie, Cell from "recharts"

methods.name: TrendLineChart({ data, dataKey = "value", xKey = "date", color = "#374151", gradient = false, height = 220 })
methods.description: A React component that renders a minimal trend line or area chart with optional gradient fill based on provided data and props.

methods.name: StackedBarChart({ data, keys, colors, xKey = "name", height = 260, legend = true })
methods.description: A React component that renders a stacked bar chart for cost data across providers or services, customizable with data, colors, and legend visibility.

methods.name: PieBreakdownChart({ data, dataKey = "value", nameKey = "name", colors = DEFAULT_COLORS, height = 260, innerRadius = 60 })
methods.description: A React component that renders a pie chart for category share breakdowns, supporting custom inner radius and color schemes.

ctags.name: PieBreakdownChart
ctags.pattern: /^export function PieBreakdownChart({ data, dataKey = "value", nameKey = "name", colors = DEFAULT_/
ctags.signature: ({ data, dataKey = "value", nameKey = "name", colors = DEFAULT_COLORS, height = 260, innerRadius = 60 })

ctags.pattern: /^export function StackedBarChart({ data, keys, colors, xKey = "name", height = 260, legend = true/
ctags.signature: ({ data, keys, colors, xKey = "name", height = 260, legend = true })

ctags.pattern: /^export function TrendLineChart({ data, dataKey = "value", xKey = "date", color = "#374151", grad/
ctags.signature: ({ data, dataKey = "value", xKey = "date", color = "#374151", gradient = false, height = 220 })
